ja - ala yakkaduwa shri saddharmodayaramaye gamwasi ha pradeshawasi sadahawathunge aadharayen idikaranu labu wehera wahansege kothpalandawima nimiththen pinkam malawak pawathwe.ikuth 1 wana da arambaunu ema pinkam malawata anuwa mema 6 wana da paswaru 06.00 ta atawisi bodhi pujawa ha paswaru 7.00 mawpiya sambhawana wadasatahana ha dharma deshanaya wiharagama sirinanda himiyan wisin da 7 wana da paswaru 06.00 atawisi bodhi pujawa ha paswaru 07.00 ta dharma deshanaya bandarawela amithananda himiyan wisin da edina rathri 09.00 sita mema 11 wana da dakwa sarwa rathrika sathi pirith deshanayak da pawathwanu labe. 8 wana da perawaruwe koth wahanse thanpath kirimada 10 wana da paswaru 03.00 ta dewadutha perahara da paswaru 07.00 ta dorakada asna anushasanawa da 11 wana da perawaruwe koth wahanse nirawaranaya kirime punya uthsawayada pawathwanu labe.anathuruwa 10.30 ta buddha pujawa da perawaru 11.00 sanghagatha dakshinawada pawathwe.

subhadra deshapriyamewara madu wandanawe yedena bathimathunge gaman pahasuwa sandaha wishesha prawahana sewawak aarambha kara athi bawa margastha magi prawahana amathi lasantha alagiyawanna mahatha pawasayi.ee anuwa dumriya departhamenthuweth shri lanka gamanagamana mandalayath eekabaddhawa me wishesha dumriya saha basratha sewawa aarambha kara athi bawath, kolambaa kotuwe sita madawachchiya dakwa dhawanaya kerunu dinapatha dumriya sewayata amatharawa dumriya pahak 12 wanida sita 15 wanida dakwa dhawanaya kerena athara madawachchiya dakwa dumriyen langawana bathimathun madu palliya dakwa ragena yamata wishesha bas ratha 50k yodawa athi bawath amathiwaraya pawasiya.

shani abesekara aparadha parikshana departhamenthuwe wimarshanawalata adala karunu sambandhayen parlimenthu manthri ranjan ramanayaka samanga pawath wu durakathana sanwadayen polis departhamenthuwa apakirthiyata lak kirima hethuwenuyi mohuge sewaya athhituwa aththe.aparadha parikshana departhamenthuwa pasugiya rajaya samaye sidukala atham parikshana pakshagrahiwa sidukara athi bawata ella wu chodana matha jathika polis komisamen parikshanayak aarambha kara ema wimarshanayata adalawa shani abesekara mita masayakata pamana pera galla niyojya polispathiwarayage paudgalika sahakara washayen maru kara yawa thibuna.me athara parlimenthu manthri ranjan ramanayakage aandolanathmaka jangama durakathana ha`dapata sambandhayen kolambaa aparadha kottashaya wishesha wimarshanayak aarambha kara thibenawa.
